attributes.action: take responsibility for the murder of the 5 british hostages
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I want the british governemnt to take full responsibility for the unneccesary murder of the 5 british hostages that they didnt bother to secure.
It has taken 2 years for the government to bring this to the publics knowledge.
They took that long,already 2 of the hostages were needlesly murdered and their bodies passed to the m.o.d because the government didnt secure talks for the safe release.
Now another undisclosed rumour has cropped up that another 2 of the hostages have been killed,one of which was a neighbour,family friend.
It now has to be put to the british public that we take a stand and ask the government to take full responsility for the unneccesary murders of these 4 people.

rejection.details: The government is already committed to doing everything possible to ensure the release of Peter Moore.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
